column1: Anyone else find it strange that the Chinese doctor who first tried to warn about the Coronavirus is now dead? And he was shut down by the police. Why would the police stop him from warning others? So much about this virus and the way it's been handled doesn't seem right to me.

'I felt like I had a belt around my chest': Rep. Ben McAdams shares details after testing positive for coronavirus https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/congress/i-felt-i-had-belt-around-my-chest-rep-ben-n1163656 … via @nbcnews
